reviews.review_msg: The workload in Carlos' class is heavy but interesting. A great lecturer with incredible passion. He possesses the kind of teaching magic that gets you into the world of finance and evokes your interest in the subject matter. Really helpful professor! Clear instructions. The deliverables are heavy, but he's a fair grader.

Professor Carlos was a big influence on me in BUS 864 that I just took with him. He will bend over backwards to help you if you ask for help. Highly recommended. A lot of information, study and attend classes. Carlos actually cares about his students succeeding. The assignment is interesting and good, and the tests are OK.

You won't learn anything in the class. A big waste of time. Andrey Pavolv should have taught this course. No programming in the course which is very annoying and credit modelling is important thing to learn to, you can learn on your own. You don't need him at all. Talk big deliver less!
